resources.string: 为什么不喜欢? 请回馈

Looks like the app cannot calculate your recipe! Check if the format is correct and if there's a space between the quantity and the ingredient
 The correct format should be "100 gr sugar(new line or space)23 Apples"
 Wrong format "100gr sugar23Apples"
Click on the legume / cereal you are interested in to find out how to cook it and the report WATER/ CHICKS . \ n

For the meat,it's advisable to have a quick medium high flame, so roast the outside parts and leave the inside ones softer and juicy.
 The flesh of Pork should always be eaten well cooked due to the risk of cysts tapeworm.

To obtain a perfect cooking you can use a kitchen thermometer and measure the INTERNAL temperature of the meat, at its center Of the piece of meat we are cooking.
 40 gradi: red meat, rare
 50 gradi: red meat, medium/rare
 60 gradi: red meat, medium
 65 gradi: medium , lamb, liver, duck, game 
 70 gradi: red meat, well. Coscia e lombata di agnello.
 72 gradi: calf, Lamb shoulder, poultry chicken, game, salmon, pig 
 74 gradi: Boiled beef, offal, poultry, turkey, pharaoh, rabbit, fish 
 78 gradi: Calf belly, calfskin and pork
 82 gradi: Braised beef, damp meats in general
